poemContent: Long col'd lay'd lands of borne The Statude des Amongus Blow freely valiant o'er the wind But no flag lies in th' wind now, not e'vr Was it all a lie? False hope built on crushed rubble, fallen dream Like blood is blood Blood will have Oxygen So said the Statude des Amongus Crimson cup'd foe, treaty of lands Ivory glov'd man Statude des Amongus Now across the desert, it ever cross'd now blows A cape of blood. Sussus nobilus amogamogus us imperialus Kapitalis, comunität Liegt unter uns, enon gussusamog et momenta Statude des Amongus 
